title: Random lag spikes 200-300 ping + disconnection (fine on OBS / Stream)

embed.description: Why am I disconnected ingame but stream is still fine... - Clipped by Pichu_tv

body: This is a stream recording, I also checked stream health and everything was fine. It keeps happening to me for no reasons. Ping also getting to 200-300 once in a while. My connection is a stable wired 200mbits download / 30mbits upload

replies.body:
If that's *only* happening while streaming, I'd honestly first suggest to test it while you don't have a stream uploading and without extra programs running in the background. Do you have those ping spikes without so much going on at once?

If you have those kinds of spikes constantly, make sure your network is able to get a solid connection with our servers first since those random disconnects mean your network keeps droppings its link with us entirely. Hit up the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and follow the steps on port forwarding and flush your DNS for the best bet at a smoother connection.

Not only happening while streaming, but it happened a lot it the past 2-3 patches. I'll look up the connection guide and try everything in there but yeah it can happen while streaming, while not streaming, sometimes I'm not even running anything in the background.
